column4: Hi all. I've been trying to get a script I wrote to start up on boot. I can see there's tons of stuff on Google about how to do this, but I have had no luck so far. I've tried putting the link to my script in /etc/rc.0 and /etc/rc.local
I'm looking in rc.local What does   "# In order to enable or disable this script just change the execution # bits."  mean
its a script make it executable for it to run
